title: Product Hunt Today Popular
description: Product Hunt Today Popular - Powered by RSSHub

items.title: StormScape
items.content: StormScape brings dynamic weather effects to macOS, featuring live snow, rain, and interactive animations optimized for performance and accessibility.
items.contentSnippet: StormScape brings dynamic weather effects to macOS, featuring live snow, rain, and interactive animations optimized for performance and accessibility.
items.creator: Lambworks
items.summary: StormScape为macOS带来动态天气效果，支持实时雪、雨及交互式动画，并针对性能和可访问性进行优化。

items.title: Stop Reels
items.content: Stop Reels lets you use Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok normally — minus the endless reels and video traps.
items.contentSnippet: Stop Reels lets you use Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok normally — minus the endless reels and video traps.
items.creator: Khalil Rouis
items.summary: Stop Reels是一款应用，允许用户正常使用Instagram、Facebook和TikTok，但禁用了无休止的Reels和视频陷阱。它帮助用户避免沉迷于短视频，从而更有效地使用这些社交平台。

items.title: Memory Chess
items.content: We help you improve your spatial memory with a game of memorising chess positions.
items.contentSnippet: We help you improve your spatial memory with a game of memorising chess positions.
items.creator: Bing Cheng
items.summary: 《记忆国际象棋》是一款通过记忆棋盘位置来提升空间记忆力的游戏。

items.title: BrainGate.io
items.content: BrainGate.io interrupts endless browsing with AI-powered popups - answer a question to regain access and stay focused!
items.contentSnippet: BrainGate.io interrupts endless browsing with AI-powered popups - answer a question to regain access and stay focused!
items.creator: Harry Smith
items.summary: BrainGate.io是一款利用AI技术拦截无限浏览的弹出窗口工具。用户需回答问题才能恢复访问权限，帮助保持专注。

items.title: Wan.Video
items.content: Wan.Video is Alibaba's official platform for AI video and image creation, all powered by its Wan models. Features generation & editing tools.
items.contentSnippet: Wan.Video is Alibaba's official platform for AI video and image creation, all powered by its Wan models. Features generation & editing tools.
items.creator: Zac Zuo
items.summary: Wan.Video是阿里巴巴的AI视频和图像创作官方平台，由Wan模型提供支持。平台提供视频生成与编辑工具。

items.title: Satori - NSDR meditations
items.content: Let AI design your custom NSDR meditation – this practice helps overactive mind to slow down and resets nervous system. Designed for people who can't turn off their brains :)
items.contentSnippet: Let AI design your custom NSDR meditation – this practice helps overactive mind to slow down and resets nervous system. Designed for people who can't turn off their brains :)
items.creator: Aleš Chromec
items.summary: Satori是一款AI设计的个性化NSDR冥想应用，旨在帮助思维活跃的人放松大脑、重置神经系统。该应用专为那些难以静心的人士设计。

items.title: Wellbot
items.content: Instantly understand what’s in your food. Simply send a product label via WhatsApp and get quick, clear nutrition insights to help you shop smarter and eat healthier.
items.contentSnippet: Instantly understand what’s in your food. Simply send a product label via WhatsApp and get quick, clear nutrition insights to help you shop smarter and eat healthier.
items.creator: Balint Horvath
items.summary: Wellbot是一款通过WhatsApp扫描产品标签，为用户提供即时、清晰的食品营养信息的工具。它帮助用户了解食物成分，从而做出更明智的购物决策，促进健康饮食。

items.title: Airtime
items.content: Look your best on video. Present with impact. Virtual backgrounds, screen recorder, present with a friend. Works with Zoom, Meet, Teams, and Webex.
items.contentSnippet: Look your best on video. Present with impact. Virtual backgrounds, screen recorder, present with a friend. Works with Zoom, Meet, Teams, and Webex.
items.creator: Chris Messina
items.summary: Airtime是一款视频会议工具，旨在帮助用户在视频通话中展现最佳形象，提升演示效果。它提供虚拟背景、屏幕录制、多人协作等功能，兼容Zoom、Meet、Teams和Webex等平台，方便用户进行高效、专业的线上沟通和展示。

items.title: Lovable 2.0
items.content: Today, we're making Lovable smarter with a chat mode agent, adding multiplayer so you can collaborate with your team, and making your projects more secure with security scanning.
items.contentSnippet: Today, we're making Lovable smarter with a chat mode agent, adding multiplayer so you can collaborate with your team, and making your projects more secure with security scanning.
items.creator: Chris Messina
items.summary: Lovable 2.0版本更新，新增智能聊天模式代理，支持多人协作功能，并引入安全扫描以增强项目安全性。

items.title: CaseTrace
items.content: The alternative method of tracking test coverage in a requirements document. Including visual overlay for requirements, notification of changes and interactive report.
items.contentSnippet: The alternative method of tracking test coverage in a requirements document. Including visual overlay for requirements, notification of changes and interactive report.
items.creator: Dmytro Bezrodny
items.summary: "CaseTrace"是一种在需求文档中跟踪测试覆盖率的替代方法。该方法包括需求的可视化叠加、变更通知和交互式报告功能。

items.title: Smodin
items.content: Smodin’s all-in-one assistant lets you write, reword, translate, and check originality in seconds—plus, detect AI content, humanize AI text, and check for plagiarism fast. Focus on creativity, not busywork.
items.contentSnippet: Smodin’s all-in-one assistant lets you write, reword, translate, and check originality in seconds—plus, detect AI content, humanize AI text, and check for plagiarism fast. Focus on creativity, not busywork.
items.creator: Ben Lang
items.summary: Smodin是一款集成助手，可快速完成写作、改写、翻译、查重、AI内容检测与人类化处理。它帮助用户专注于创意，简化繁琐工作。

items.title: Kling AI 2.0
items.content: Kling AI 2.0 is all about empowering creators to bring meaningful stories to life — with powerful tools and greater creative freedom!
items.contentSnippet: Kling AI 2.0 is all about empowering creators to bring meaningful stories to life — with powerful tools and greater creative freedom!
items.creator: Kevin William David
items.summary: Kling AI 2.0旨在通过强大工具和更高创作自由度，赋能创作者讲述有意义的故事。

items.title: Circleback
items.content: Circleback helps teams get the most out of every meeting–online or in-person–with AI notes and powerful automations. Build automations to create Linear tasks from demo feedback, update your CRM with customer details, generate sales feedback, and more.
items.contentSnippet:
Circleback helps teams get the most out of every meeting–online or in-person–with AI notes and powerful automations.

Build automations to create Linear tasks from demo feedback, update your CRM with customer details, generate sales feedback, and more.
items.creator: Garry Tan
items.summary: "Circleback"是一款AI会议助手，通过智能笔记和自动化功能帮助团队充分利用线上或线下会议。它支持创建任务、更新CRM信息、生成销售反馈等自动化操作，提升会议效率。
